column4: hey guys I'd like to change the extension on a whole bunch of files in one directory.  What would be the easiest way to do that?
I would use rename.ul (which used to be just rename, before they renamed prename to rename and rename to rename.ul)
would that work on a number of files at once?  I want to keep the filename.. just change the extension
with rename.ul do "rename.ul .jpg .JPG *.jpg" or whatever the extentions are, like "rename.ul ext1 ext *.ext1"
